paragraph_1:
Dr. & Mrs. Sivakumaran and Mr. & Mrs. Sritharan
request the pleasure of your company on the occassion of the marriage of
paragraph_2: on the Sunday of September 2026 muhurtham between 11:30 am and 1:00 pm at the The Grand 90 Cathies Lane, Wantirna South, Victoria 3152, Australia and join us for Lunch there after.
